SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Fosterborough Stars?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Fosterborough Stars is arc {South Stars}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Poolechester Dynasty?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Poolechester Dynasty is arc {South Stars}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {South Stars} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Poolechester Dynasty} has the largest input flow.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 680? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {690} from {South Stars} to {Poolechester Dynasty}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 346? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {312} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}, a flow of {272} from {Fosterborough Stars} to {South Stars}, a flow of {214} from {South Stars} to {Fosterborough Stars}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 346 and 503? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {494} from {Fosterborough Stars} to {Poolechester Dynasty}, a flow of {402} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {Fosterborough Stars}, a flow of {381} from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {Poolechester Dynasty}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Fosterborough Stars to Poolechester Dynasty or from Rebeccaview Dolphins to Poolechester Dynasty?
NC.A: The flow from {Fosterborough Stars} to {Poolechester Dynasty} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Poolechester Dynasty to Rebeccaview Dolphins, from Rebeccaview Dolphins to South Stars, or from South Stars to Poolechester Dynasty?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {Poolechester Dynasty} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Fosterborough Stars}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Poolechester Dynasty} and {South Stars}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc South Stars, Arc Poolechester Dynasty, Arc Rebeccaview Dolphins, Arc Fosterborough Stars}.
